products.title: Swiss Beauty Highlighting Primer
description: This lightweight highlighting primer by Swiss Beauty blends seamlessly into your skin, giving it a luminous glow while prepping it for flawless makeup application.
whyChooseUs: Swiss Beauty stands for affordability, quality, and elegance. Our products are dermatologically tested, cruelty-free, and designed for Indian skin tones and climate.
products.sustainabilityCare: We use eco-conscious packaging and sustainable ingredient sourcing wherever possible. Always patch test. Store in a cool, dry place. Recycle after use.

products.title: Dior Sauvage Parfum
description: Dior Sauvage Parfum is a highly concentrated interpretation of the original Sauvage, blending extreme freshness with warm ambery tones—all wrapped in a rich, intoxicating trail inspired by a crackling fire under moonlit skies. It evokes vast, untamed landscapes and rugged elegance.
whyChooseUs: We source only the finest ingredients and authentic products—ensuring quality you can trust, every time you shop with us.
products.sustainabilityCare: At the heart of our mission is a commitment to sustainability and conscious care.

products.title: Dior Prestige Le Concentré Yeux
description: Dior Prestige Le Concentré Yeux is a luxurious anti-aging eye cream designed to visibly reverse four major signs of aging around the eye area—lifting the upper eyelid and cheekbone, smoothing crow’s feet, and correcting the tear trough (dark circles and puffiness). Infused with Rosapeptide™ and yeast extract, the formula works synergistically to revitalize and illuminate the eye contour. It features a wax-to-cream texture that melts into the skin for up to 24 hours of hydration and comes with Dior’s signature dual-rotating “Open-Eye” applicator that enhances results the longer you use it. After one month, 96% of women reported that their eyes appeared more open and refreshed.
whyChooseUs: Unmatched Expertise – Developed using Dior’s exclusive Rosapeptide™ technology, leveraging the rare Rose de Granville and advanced peptides to target fatigue and aging.
products.sustainabilityCare: Luxury with Responsibility – Comes in a refillable jar, reducing waste and supporting sustainable consumption.

reviews.name: Geordie
reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.comment: Beautiful product, well worth the money! I hardly need any at all.

reviews.title: Instant tightening & glow
reviews.comment: Instant firming sensation and improved softness. My dark circles improved massively

reviews.name: Beverley Toni
reviews.title: Amazing eye cream
reviews.comment: After a couple of months of use, the skin around my eyes looks brighter and smoother.

products.title: M·A·C Matte Lipstick
description: M·A·C’s Matte Lipstick delivers pigment‑rich, full‑coverage matte color with a signature vanilla scent and a velvety-smooth texture. Though it is matte, the formula is designed to be creamy and comfortable—many shades glide on softly and last 4–6 hours, sometimes longer with prep and touch‑ups.
whyChooseUs: Expertly Curated Shades – We offer the most iconic M·A·C shades, renowned for their depth, versatility, and timeless appeal.
products.sustainabilityCare: Improved Eco-Packaging – Many M·A·C lipstick cases now feature at least 30% PCR (post-consumer recycled) material, aligning with our commitment to sustainability.

products.title: M·A·C Plus Foundation
description: A cult-favorite pressed powder foundation offering buildable, medium-to-full coverage with an ultra-matte, velvety finish. It blurs imperfections, stays put up to 12 hours, resists creasing or streaking, and keeps shine under control. Specifically designed to be breathable yet long-wearing—even in heat and humidity.
whyChooseUs: Delivers a flawless matte look that lasts all day—ideal for busy days, oily skin, or humid weather.
products.sustainabilityCare: Includes talc and silica for optimal oil control and vitamin E for antioxidant benefits—ensuring breathability and smoothness.

products.sustainabilityCare: Cruelty-Free Ethos – Aligned with M·A·C’s commitment: no animal testing and compliant with ethical production.

products.title: Sugar Acid Sunscreen Gel
description: Sugar Tan Ban Hyaluronic Acid Sunscreen Gel SPF 50+ PA+++ is a gel-based sunscreen with a primer-like texture that delivers invisible, broad-spectrum UV protection with zero white cast. This breathable, water- and sweat-resistant formula blurs pores, smooths fine lines, and hydrates deeply thanks to hyaluronic acid and liquorice extract. It glides on lightweight and dries to a velvety matte finish—ideal for both makeup prep and sun protection on the go.
whyChooseUs: Suitable for all skin types (including sensitive), non-comedogenic, cruelty-free, vegan, and free of parabens, mineral oil, and added fragrance.
products.sustainabilityCare: Committed to being vegan and cruelty-free, with transparent ingredient sourcing and ethical manufacturing.

products.title: Sugar Transferproof Foundation
description: SUGAR Matte Match Transferproof Foundation is a full-coverage, long-wear liquid foundation designed for up to 24 hours of flawless matte wear. Lightweight and breathable, it delivers a soft-matte finish that blurs pores, fine lines, and imperfections. Waterproof, sweat-resistant, and made to feel weightless on your skin, it’s ideal for Indian climates, oily or combination skin types, and those who want no-touch-up confidence.It also features antioxidant-rich moisturizing actives to nourish without oiliness. Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, and completely vegan.
whyChooseUs: Exceptional 24-Hour Wear: Transferproof, waterproof, and fade-resistant—your base stays immaculate even in sweat or rain.SUGAR Cosmetics+3
products.sustainabilityCare: Ethical & Transparent: Adheres to vegan, cruelty-free standards, with clean formulations—no fragrance or alcohol.

products.title: Lakmē 9 to 5 CC Cream
description: Lakmé’s 9 to 5 Complexion Care CC Cream combines skincare and makeup in one easy step. It offers medium, breathable coverage, SPF 30 PA++ protection, and brightening ingredients like Vitamin B3 and Vitamin E. Its creamy yet lightweight texture helps even out skin tone, minimize pores, and leave a natural matte or slightly dewy finish—perfect for daily office or everyday wear in the Indian climate.
whyChooseUs: Effortless Everyday Grooming: Combines moisturizer, tint, and SPF in one go—perfect for busy mornings or minimal makeup routines.
products.sustainabilityCare: Simple, Clean Formula: Though not fragrance-free, the mildly scented formula is lightweight and generally non-irritating; however, it contains sunscreen filters and fatty acids that might not suit extra oily or highly sensitive skin.

products.title: Dot & Key Moisturizer Skin
description: Dot & Key’s Barrier Repair Moisturizer (Ceramides & Hyaluronic Acid) is designed to support and hydrate the skin barrier with a skin-friendly probiotic formula. Enriched with five essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid, rice water, and probiotic extracts, this lightweight moisturizer deeply hydrates, strengthens, and soothes the skin—making it ideal for dry, normal, sensitive, and combination skin types. It absorbs quickly without feeling heavy or greasy.
whyChooseUs: A scientifically-backed blend of ceramides and probiotics helps restore the skin’s natural barrier and retain moisture effectively.
products.sustainabilityCare: Works safely alongside vitamin C, niacinamide, retinoids, and exfoliating acids for barrier support.

products.title: Dot & Key Barrier Repair Moisturizer
description: Dot & Key Barrier Repair Moisturizer is a deeply hydrating, skin-barrier-strengthening cream enriched with 5 essential ceramides, hyaluronic acid, probiotics, and rice water. Its lightweight, non-comedogenic texture makes it suitable for dry, sensitive, normal, and combination skin types.

products.title: BEILI Brush Collection
description: The BEILI Makeup Brush Collection includes curated sets of 20 or 30 professional brushes, combining natural goat hair, synthetic fibers, and nano wool for ultra-soft performance. Designed to cover all makeup essentials—foundation, powder, concealer, contour, blush, eyeshadow, brow, and liner—these thoughtfully crafted brushes deliver smooth, precise blending and application. Ideal for both makeup beginners and pros seeking variety in one kit.
whyChooseUs: Provides every essential brush in a single kit—foundation, blending, contour, shading, and more—for a complete professional routine.
products.sustainabilityCare: Handles are wooden with water-based paint, non-toxic and designed to resist cracking—even after cleaning.

products.title: Sugar Matte Setting Mist

products.title: Swiss Beauty Holographic Eyeliner
description: Swiss Beauty’s Holographic Eyeliner is a vibrant, color-shifting eyeliner available in six dazzling shades—like Milky Way, Northern Light, and Nebula. With its creamy retractable formula, it glides on smoothly, offering intense holographic shimmer that shifts under different lighting. The waterproof and smudge-proof finish ensures bold, long-lasting wear for parties, reels, and standout looks
whyChooseUs: Retractable pencil tip eliminates the need for sharpening. Compact and easy to use on the go.
products.sustainabilityCare: While packaging is minimal and recyclable, Swiss Beauty does not currently offer refill or eco-certified formats.

products.title: Dot & Key Hydrating Gel
description: A lightweight, oil-free gel moisturizer infused with probiotics, hyaluronic acid, rice water, and ceramides, designed to hydrate and strengthen the skin barrier. The gel texture absorbs quickly, cooling instantly, and provides hydration without grease—ideal for oily, combination, and normal skin types. While labeled for 72‑hour hydration, typical wear lasts up to 4–6 hours depending on skin type. It balances the microbiome, soothes irritation, and reflects skin clarity and smoothness.
whyChooseUs: Enhances your skin’s natural defenses and microbiome health with mild calming benefits.
products.sustainabilityCare: Cruelty-free and made with thoughtfully selected ingredients. Packaging is recyclable where available.
